title: What is the speed limit on 17/74/76 in Leland headed towards Wilmington,  between where 17 merges with 74/76 (just past Waterford) and the Village Rd. overpass?  Drivers heading north on 17 last see a speed limit sign of 55 mph, While drivers heading East on 74/76 last see a speed limit sign of 60 mph.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8328
